sections.title: Introduction
sections.content: This portfolio website showcases modern React best practices and a beautiful, interactive UI, inspired by creative LED matrix projects.

sections.title: Features
sections.content:
- Responsive design
- Interactive project gallery
- Real-time previews

sections.title: How it Works
sections.content: The site is built with React and TypeScript, using a modular component structure and Redux for state management. Animations and effects are inspired by LED matrix visuals.

sections.title: Conclusion
sections.content: A modern portfolio that blends web development and creative display technology.
